title: 'Unable to connect to server. please check your network connection...' happens every game
body:
Running a Mac OS. Ive never had an issue with this until a few days ago. ran hextech repair. delete LoL and reinstalled. nothing seems to work. it happens every single game where i have to quit and reconnect. even has the error when i reconnect until i hit the 'retry' button.

im on Telstra Cable and everything seems to be working fine including League Voice but just the game that gets disconnected. Help!

replies.body: Yep, there's an issue. See here -> https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/bPfLvjTR-network-issues-telstra
i see its happening to most telstra players... cheers bro... will keep an eye out on the thread...
